pages.text: The $(mob)Selkie$() is a monster that spawns in Ice Plains in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It attacks players on sight with ranged attacks which may include $(thing)Slowness$() and $(thing)Weakness$() potion arrows. The $(mob)Selkie$() switches to melee and gains a $(thing)Speed$() effect when its target is within 3 blocks of it. $(mob)Selkies$() are vulnerable to warm climates and are inflicted with $(thing)Slowness$() and $(thing)Weakness$() if they enter warm or hot biomes.
$(mob)Selkies$() drop $(item)Fur$() on death, which can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Leather$().

$(mob)Selkies$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
